H0.text: Who wrote the 19th century novel ‘Anna Karenina’. Fyodor Dostoevsky

H1.text: Who wrote the 19th century novel ‘Anna Karenina’. Gustave Flaubert

H2.text: Who wrote the 19th century novel ‘Anna Karenina’. Jane Austen

H3.text: Who wrote the 19th century novel ‘Anna Karenina’. Tolstoy

A4.text: Anna Karenina (Russian: Анна Каренина, IPA: [ˈanːə kɐˈrʲenʲɪnə]) is a novel, first published in book form in 1878, by the Russian author Leo Tolstoy.

A5.text: Tolstoy called it his first true novel.
